Havasu National Wildlife Refuge.knownFor: “ Excellent scenery ” Reviewed February 20, 2012 Paddled 17 miles down the Colorado River through Topock Gorge from Moabi to Castle Rock. Saw Bighorn Sheep and the Petroglyphs. Helpful? 2 Thank travelguy537 Report

Rivers Edge Golf Course.address: 144 Marina Dr , Needles , CA 92363-3714 (Formerly Needles Municipal Golf Course)
reviewComments: We love golfing at the Rivers Edge. It's a city course...sand traps are very hard not soft sand. It's got a 69 rating and is a good challenge. Nice and flat to walk the course.
